General.Name: MCI Onehealth Technologies Inc
General.Description: MCI Onehealth Technologies Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides healthcare and healthcare related services to patients and the employees of corporate customers in Canada. It offers government-insured primary and specialty healthcare services through medical clinics, MCI Connect virtual care platform, and telemedicine; privately insured healthcare services to the employees of corporate customers; concierge medical services; technology-enabled rare disease screening services; clinical research services; and pulmonary function testing lab services. The company was formerly known as MCI Brighthealth Technologies Inc. and changed its name to MCI Onehealth Technologies Inc. in December 2020. MCI Onehealth Technologies Inc. was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 4881 Yonge Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M2N 5X3
